name: BeamaLife
overview:
BeamaLife offers a unique fusion of expert advice and state-of the-art technology to provide consumers with the product knowledge they need to purchase the appropriate type and amount of life insurance. BeamaLife has developed proprietary technology and processes that enable us to compare life insurance products from more than 100 highly rated life insurance companies. What differentiates BeamaLife from the competition is the ability to offer customized solutions without sales pressure, forming a partnership with the consumer and encouraging participation in the process rather than just being the recipient of someone else’s choices.

BeamaLife is not an insurance company but we offer the full range of insurance products from all of the top life insurance companies including Whole Life, Universal Life Insurance, Return of Premium & Simple Term Life, College Savings, Retirement Savings, Long Term Care Insurance, Disability Income Insurance and Fixed Annuities. We are a nationwide company and licensed in all 50 States and the District of Columbia.

http://www.beamalife.com
